Title: Blast furnaces rise in level ground releasing red rays everywhere
Designer: Tian Yuwen (田郁文)Zhu Zhangchao (朱章超)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Small furnaces are built everywhere to increase steel production. Useful objects, like cutlery and tools, are melted down to steel that is usually of such low quality that nothing can be done with it.
